chapters.title: Chapter 13: Wonderful News
chapters.info: Nesune Bihara, p. 302 (343)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She is one of the Aes Sedai now sworn Rand; she assisted in his kidnapping. She always listens to all sides before drawing any conclusions, and she remembers everything. She is slender, has black eyes, and grew up in Kandor. Min had a viewing of her: she will found a library. She is now one of Cadsuane's companions.
